name: article-manager
description: Full-stack TypeScript article management system for AI agents

scripts.dev: bun run dev:backend & bun run dev:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: bun build src/frontend/App.tsx --outdir=public --target=browser --minify --splitting --format=esm --entry-naming=[dir]/[name].[hash].[ext] --chunk-naming=[name].[hash].[ext] && bun run build:html && bun run build:css
scripts.build:html:
node -e "const fs=require('fs');const files=fs.readdirSync('public').filter(f=>f.startsWith('App.')&&f.endsWith('.js'));const cssFiles=fs.readdirSync('public').filter(f=>f.startsWith('App.')&&f.endsWith('.css'));const html='Article Manager
';fs.writeFileSync('public/index.html',html);"
scripts.setup-hooks:
test -d .git && echo '#!/bin/sh
bun run typecheck' > .git/hooks/pre-commit && chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-commit || exit 0
